StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetIMOAc.vityCounts]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RecruiterID uniqueiden..er = null, @OrgID int = null, @DateFrom date.me = null, @DateTo date.me = null, @IsApproved bit = 0
AS BEGIN
SET @DateTo = DATEADD(second, -1, DATEADD(day, 1, @DateTo))
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET NOCOUNT ON
declare @EpCont int declare @HvCont int declare @TcCont int declare @AcCont int
declare @TcAppt int declare @AcAppt int declare @HvAppt int declare @EpAppt int
declare @TcMade int declare @AcMade int declare @HvMade int declare @EpMade int
declare @EpInt int declare @HvInt int declare @AcInt int declare @TcInt int
declare @OtScr int declare @OtInt int
--USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyTcMade(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, 1, @IsApproved) AS TcMadeAm, --USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyTcMade(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, 2, @IsApproved) AS TcMadePm, --USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyTcMade(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, 3, @IsApproved) AS TcMadeEvening, SELECT @TCMade = Count(pc.ProspectId) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI', 'NA', 'NH', 'NHCB', 'NHLM') AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo)) AND pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) )
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyTcContact(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, 1, @IsApproved) AS TcContAm, --USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyTcContact(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, 2, @IsApproved) AS TcContPm, --USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyTcContact(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, 3, @IsApproved) AS TcContEvening,
SELECT @TCCont = Count(*) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'TC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo))
AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) )
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyApptByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'TC', @Year, @Month, @Day, 1, @IsApproved) AS TcApptAm, --USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyApptByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'TC', @Year, @Month, @Day, 2, @IsApproved) AS TcApptPm, --USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyApptByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'TC', @Year, @Month, @Day, 3, @IsApproved) AS TcApptEvening,
SELECT @TCAppt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='TC') AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ --USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyInterviewByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'TC', @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS TcInterview,
SELECT @TCInt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='TC' ) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyOtContact (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS OtCont, SELECT @OTScr = Count(*) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'OT' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('OT-S', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) --AND (YEAR(pc.ProspectDate) = @Year) --AND (MONTH(pc.ProspectDate) = @Month) --AND (DAY(pc.ProspectDate) = @Day OR @Day IS NULL) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo))
AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) )
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyInterviewByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'OT', @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS OtInterview, SELECT @OTInt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='OT' ) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyAcContact (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS AcCont, SELECT @ACCont = Count(*) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'AC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo)) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyApptByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'AC', @Year, @Month, @Day, NULL, @IsApproved) AS AcAppt, SELECT @ACAppt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='AC') AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo)) ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyInterviewByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'AC', @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS AcInterview, SELECT @ACInt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='AC' ) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyHvMade (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS HvMade,
SELECT @HVMade = Count(*) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'HV' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI', 'HV-NA', 'HV-NH') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo)) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) )
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyHvContact (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS HvCont,
SELECT @HVCont = Count(*) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'HV' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo)) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) )
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyApptByType(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'HV', @Year, @Month, @Day, NULL, @IsApproved) AS HvAppt,
SELECT @HVAppt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='HV') AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyInterviewByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'HV', @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS HvInterview,
SELECT @HVInt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='HV' ) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyEpSent (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS EpSent,
SELECT @EpMade = Count(*) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI', 'DC-U', 'DC-M', 'DC-R') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo)) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) ) ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyEpContact (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS EpCont,
SELECT @EPCont = Count(*) FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectComment pc INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac ON pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectCommentType pct ON pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE pac.Ac.vity = 'DC' AND pct.ProspectCommentType IN ('CM', 'Col', 'Col-S', 'Col-R', 'NI') AND (pc.IsApproved = @IsApproved) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR pc.ProspectDate <= @dateTo)) AND pc.ProspectId IN (SELECT P.ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on Org ON P.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId=Org.rowguid WHERE (pc.Recrui.ngPersonId=@RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL) AND (ORGANIZATION_ID=@OrgID OR @OrgID IS NULL) )
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyApptByType(@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'EP', @Year, @Month, @Day, NULL, @IsApproved) AS EpAppt, SELECT @EPAppt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e, RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo, RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p WHERE e.ID=s.EventId AND e.ID = eo.EventId AND s.subjectId=p.ProspectId AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND e.EventSourceId = 16 AND e.EventTypeId = 85 AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='DC') AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- USMC.GetDailyOrMonthlyInterviewByType (@RecruiterID, @OrgID, 'EP', @Year, @Month, @Day, @IsApproved) AS EpInterview SELECT @EPInt = Count(*) FROM RSSOSS.USMC.Event e INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject s ON e.ID = s.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOwners eo ON e.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventOutcome oc ON e.ID = oc.EventId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventType et ON e.EventTypeId = et.ID INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON s.subjectId = p.ProspectId WHERE (InterviewOutcomeId=1 or InterviewOutcomeId=2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow-up AND et.Type != 'Follow Up' AND e.IsApproved = @IsApproved AND (@RecruiterID IS NULL OR @RecruiterID = eo.OwnerId) AND (@OrgID IS NULL OR e.Organiza.onId = @OrgID) AND (Ac.vity='DC' ) AND ((@dateFrom IS NULL OR StartDate >= @dateFrom) AND (@dateTo IS NULL OR StartDate <= @dateTo))
;
SELECT ISNULL(@TCmade,0) as TcMade ,ISNULL(@TCint,0) as TcInt ,ISNULL(@TCcont,0) as TcCont ,ISNULL(@TCappt,0) as TcAppt
,ISNULL(@OTscr,0) as OtScr ,ISNULL(@OTint,0) as OtInt
,ISNULL(@ACCont,0) as AcMade ,ISNULL(@ACint,0) as AcInt ,ISNULL(@ACappt,0) AS AcAppt
,ISNULL(@HVmade,0) as HvMade ,ISNULL(@HVcont,0) AS HvCont ,ISNULL(@HVappt,0) AS HvAppt ,ISNULL(@HVint,0) AS HvInt
,ISNULL(@EPmade,0) as EpMade ,ISNULL(@EPcont,0) AS EpCont ,ISNULL(@EPappt,0) AS EpAppt ,ISNULL(@Epint,0) AS EpInt
,'0' as OtMade ,'0' as Nwa ,'0' as Contract ,0 as AnalysisMonth
END
